entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
